name: Launch Party (itch)
description:
Launch Party is a multiplayer ship-programming game played via Twitch stream. Write some code, send it as a comment, and watch your ship take off! Everyone is racing to be the first to land on the moon.

Since it's a party game, it's recommended you play this game with three or more people. It's playable in any browser that supports Twitch, as well as on mobile with the Twitch app.

This game was made for the 2020 Github Game Off with the theme "Moonshot." All game programming, art, music, and sound design were completed within the one-month jam.

The entire game's source code is available in our Github repository. Feel free to use and distribute it in any way allowed by the MIT license.

Credits
  • plasmastarfish: programming, art, music, sound effects
  • superduperpacman42: programming
  • Fonts used:
    • A Goblin Appears
    • ASAP
    • Eras Demi ITC
    • Pixel Caps
